name: Death's Gamble
description:
You walked with a high head, made a whole hell of a lot of money, and were pretty good at cards. But you pissed off the wrong person, turning a profitable game of poker into your death. There's no rest for a gambler though as even in the after-life, Death wishes for you to bet your soul for the chance of returning to the land of the living.

This was made for my game design & programming class as the first assigned project.

It is highly recommended to play in fullscreen mode.

The background song is this royalty-free song (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jRQWZJil48E) which I downloaded and edited by adding a bunch of filters to it.
